muno.game

Class DrawPile

  • java.lang.Object
    • muno.game.DrawPile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DrawPile
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class that represents the draw pile of the UNO game.
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Checks if the draw pile is empty
        Returns:
        true if the pile is empty, false if not.

      • getCard

        public Card getCard()
        Gets a card from the draw pile, removing the card from it.
        Returns:
        last card in the arraylist

      • newDeck

        public void newDeck()
        Creates a new deck of MUNO cards

      • setDrawPile

        public void setDrawPile(java.util.ArrayList<Card> cardArray)
        Receives an array of cards and sets the DrawPile, then shuffles the cards. This method is for when the cards of the DrawPile are finished, along with the method askCards of the DiscardPile;
        Parameters:
        cardArray - ArrayList of cards to set the DrawPile.
